underlying_goal: Investigate and fix a bug where summary fields display all black circles (●) when registering special subheadings with manuscript content in a specific order in STEP2 of a Japanese CMS registration system
brief_summary: User asked Claude to investigate a black circle (●) summary bug in a Japanese CMS registration system; Claude conducted thorough codebase exploration identifying a likely root cause (order-of-operations issue) and prepared an implementation plan, but no code fix was applied yet.
